snippet.title: Morbid: The Lords of Ire - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | The MIX Showcase March 2023
snippet.description:
Join a member of the development team at Still Running for a peek at Morbid: The Lords of Ire, including the story, your mission, combat mechanics, enemies, features like weapon and insanity upgrade systems and more, from this upcoming game from the makers of Morbid: The Seven Acolytes. Morbid: The Lords of Ire is coming to PC and consoles in 2023.

In Morbid: The Lords of Ire, experience another bloody disgusting take on the souls-like genre with unnerving aesthetics, abysmal monsters and gore galore as you set out to defeat the Lords of Ire.
